content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;
SELECT 
    JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type') payment_type,
    JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc') payment_type_desc
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE='0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR='0x0a'
) WITH(
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) as payment_type
